reset_password.title: Forgotten password
reset_password.success: Your password has successfully been reset. Please do the first connection process in order to set your new password.
reset_password.successMail: An email allowing you to reset your password has been sent to you.
reset_password.userNotExist: The user corresponding to the information entered could not be found.
reset_password.cannotFindToken: Error, can not find your reset token.

first_connection.title: First connection
first_connection.success_login: Update done, you are now log in !
first_connection.userNotExist: This user does not exist or has already been activated.
first_connection.alreadyHavePassword: Operation is not possible, this user already has a password.
first_connection.passwordNotValid: The password is not valid, please try again.

help.password_content:
Please choose your password, it must respect the following format:

- 8 characters minimum
- At least 1 digit
- At least 1 capital letter
- At least 1 special character (!@#$%^&*)

login.login_fail: The login and / or password is not correct, please try again.
login.not_enabled: Your account does not seem to be activated, please complete the first connection process.
login.logout_success: You have been successfully logged out.

settings.tool_success: The access configuration file has been imported.
settings.error1: Please enter a new password before saving.
settings.error2: The two passwords do not match.
settings.error3: Your new password must be at least 4 characters long.
settings.error4: Your current password is not valid.

access_settings.no_access_role: Your role allow for this action

agenda.start_date: Please fill the start date before.
agenda.start_after_end: The start date is after the end date, please fix it.
agenda.end_before_start: The end date is before the start date, please fix it.

help.description:
Document templates can be used in the corresponding tab of any entity with the component Document template. When creating your template, you must include the variables listed below where you want them to appear, they'll be replaced on the spot when you click on the 'Generate' button.

  To use createdAt and updatedAt of each entity please add:
{createdAt} for the date of creation
{updatedAt} for the date of update
  Type boolean
{variable.value} to acces the untranslated value of field
{variable.translation} to acces the translated value
  Type enum
{variable.value} to acces the untranslated value
{variable.translation} to acces the translated value
  Type date
{variable.value} to access the unformated value
{variable.converted} to access the formated value

Select an entity in the dropdown to discover available variables and how to use them.

global.description: These varibales start with g_ and are accessible in all entities.

images_ressources.label: Image ressources
images_ressources.description:
These variables start with img_ and are available from any entity.

They allow inclusion of Image ressources previously created in the administration module. Use Image ressource's code field in your template so it can be replaced by the image's base64 buffer
images_ressources.example:
Example :
To include an Image ressource with the following code {img_logo} in a Dust template, provide the image's buffer to an img HTML element : src="{img_logo}"

address.inline_help: To have a valid map, please use the field below to enter the address

validation.float: Field %s must be a floating number
validation.boolean: Field %s must be a true or false
